member.name: M:A5.Controller.AwardController.RaiseRequest(A5.Models.Award)
member.summary: This Method is used to raise request for Awardee
member.returns: Return true when the request is added in the database otherwise return "sorry internal error is occured"

member.name: M:A5.Controller.AwardController.Approval(A5.Models.Award)
member.summary: This Method is used to Approve or reject the request by Approver
member.remarks:
Sample request:
PUT / Approve or reject by Approver { "requesterId": 11, "awardeeId": 8, "awardTypeId": 2, "approverId": 5, "reason": "Best Performer", "statusId": 3, }
member.returns: Return the true whether the request getting approved or rejected otherwise it show "sorry internal error occured"

member.name: M:A5.Controller.AwardController.GetAwardById(System.Int32)
member.summary: This Method is used to get the details about the Specific Awardee by id whether he/she is getting Approved or rejected or published
member.returns: Return the informations and status about the specific Awardee

member.name: M:A5.Controller.AwardController.GetAwardsList(System.Int32)
member.summary: This Method is used to get all awardees including pending Awardees, Approved Awardees, Rejected Awardees, published Awardees
member.returns: Return List of Awardees who are in the status of pending, Approved, rejected, published

member.name: M:A5.Controller.AwardController.AddComment(A5.Models.Comment)
member.summary: This Method is used to Add comments for an Awardee who is getting an award
member.returns: Return

member.name: M:A5.Controller.AwardController.GetComments(System.Int32)
member.summary: This Method is used to get comments of Specific awardee
member.returns: Return the comments and some details of awardee

member.name: M:A5.Controller.AwardTypeController.Create(A5.Models.AwardType)
member.summary: This Method is used to create new Award
member.remarks:
Sample request:
POST / CreateAward { "awardName": "First Victor", "awardDescription": "Good Performer", "imageString": "" }
member.returns: Return "Award Added Successfully" when the AwardType is added in the database otherwise return "Sorry internal error occured".

member.name: M:A5.Controller.AwardTypeController.Update(A5.Models.AwardType)
member.summary: This Method is used to update award by id
member.returns: Returns the updated data of AwardType

member.summary: This Method is used to disable the Award by id
